title: Budget potato and onion soup
ingredients: ['4 to 6 spring onions, diced', '2 tablespoons butter or margarine', '6 large potatoes', '1 tablespoon thyme', '1 handful fresh basil, chopped', '4 cloves garlic cloves, crushed', 'a few sprigs sage', '2 tablespoons mustard seeds, crushed', '1 to 2 vegetable stock cubes (optional)', '1 ladle milk or cream']
